Articles.Content:
After a long download, I unpacked the zip file. I ran the "Launcher" and let it download (and update?) the "Patcher". Then I exited, and then went and ran the "KSP" application outright. This is what I get every time I run it...

 

So now what?
Go to settings.cfg and manualy edit the resolution to be big enough to click on that pop-up, and then you can play the game... somewhat.

Thanks, I'll give that try.

EDIT:
That worked ok. I set it to my screen's resolution and enabled full screen. Odd that should have been an issue however.

Edited April 22, 2016 by LordFerret
added result
